content.raw: This seems to have lost the code that handles the case where `t` is not an array. labscript does not enforce that `t` must be an array \(in fact [here](#!/labscript_suite/labscript/src/028edc9b979eaf946d1e5fa1a2a4a10a9e8c5e7d/labscript.py?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#labscript.py-1102) is an instance where it explicitly passes something that is not an array, I suspect there are others\).
content.html: This seems to have lost the code that handles the case where t is not an array. labscript does not enforce that t must be an array (in fact here is an instance where it explicitly passes something that is not an array, I suspect there are others).
